Hi, I'm Martine.

I like building things for the web.

I'm a front-end developer & UI designer based in Norway.

Contact me

About.

Front-end Developer / UI Designer

Hello! My name is Martine and I like designing and creating things that will end up on the internet. I have always had a bit of interest in creating digital things, but my interest for it turned serious first in 2019 and have only increased since then.

I am aiming to create better user experience, beautiful yet simple and accessible designs and writing clean and human code.

Toolbox and things I work with:

Design

Adobe- Xd, Illustrator, Photoshop. Figma, Miro, Invision

My Design process:

1. User Research

2. Ideation

3. Prototype

4. Test / Development

Coding

HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JavaScript, React, Git, Github, RESTful API, Firebase, Netlify, Heroku, Headless CMS (Strapi), Wordpress, Responsive Websites and Web Accessibility.

Currently working on:

Improving my understand of (vanilla) JavaScript as well as React and FireBase. I also try and do some challenges on frontendmentor.
